column1: Art Institute of Chicago////After coming here for several years
column2: I've come to the conclusion that this is one of the best conglomerations of artistic relevance in the United States. On top of its numerous collections
column3: it has an amazing impressionist collection
column4: including some very famous paintings that I don't even need to mention. If you're in Chicago
column5: you have to see this place at least once before you leave
column6: it is worth every dollar you spend on admission. I suggest the free Thursdays after work....
